data.comment: The match has started at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Barcelona to take a throw-in in Cadiz territory.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Barcelona's Frenkie De Jong gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cadiz defender.
Throw-in for Barcelona at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
An unfortunate own goal by Alvaro Gimenez makes the score 1-0.
In the minute 11, Free kick for Cadiz in their own half.
Goal kick for Barcelona at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Barcelona are coming forward and Philippe Coutinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 14, Cesar Soto Grado awards Cadiz a goal kick.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Cadiz.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz.
In the minute 17, Martin Braithwaite gets his shot on target but fails to score for Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Cadiz.
In the minute 21, In Cadiz Barcelona attack through Lionel Messi. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick Barcelona.
Barcelona's Lionel Messi gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Ramon de Carranza. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 26, Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
Play has been interrupted briefly in Cadiz to check on Marcos Mauro, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 30, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz in their own half.
Alvaro Cervera (Cadiz) has taken off Marcos Mauro who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Pedro Alcala is the replacement.
Cesar Soto Grado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 32, Cesar Soto Grado signals a Barcelona throw-in in Cadiz's half.
Throw-in Cadiz.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
In the minute 36, Goal kick for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Cadiz to take a throw-in in Barcelona territory.
Can Barcelona capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cadiz's half?
In the minute 38, Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
Cadiz awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Barcelona.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cadiz awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Cesar Soto Grado will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Jordi Alba for Barcelona gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Barcelona in Cadiz.
Barcelona drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Cesar Soto Grado blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Cesar Soto Grado has blown to start the second-half.
Pedri is on a sub for Oscar Mingueza for Barcelona.
Ousmane Dembele is replacing Philippe Coutinho for Barcelona at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 47, Cesar Soto Grado awards Barcelona a goal kick.
Ball safe as Barcelona is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 50, In Cadiz, Pedri of Barcelona is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Cadiz Barcelona drive forward through Lionel Messi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Free kick Cadiz.
In the minute 52, Cadiz have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a throw-in for Barcelona, close to Cadiz's area.
In the minute 56, Cadiz needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
Goal! Barcelona go level at 1-1 through Pedro Alcala in Cadiz.
Lionel Messi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 58, Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Barcelona in the half of Cadiz.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
In the minute 61, Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Cadiz just outside Barcelona's area.
Clement Lenglet (Barcelona) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 62, Cadiz push forward at Estadio Ramon de Carranza and Alberto Perea gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Barcelona defence.
Throw-in for Barcelona in their own half.
Alvaro Negredo is replacing Alvaro Gimenez for the home team.
Goal! Cadiz have got their heads in front thanks to a Alvaro Negredo strike.
In the minute 64, In Cadiz a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Pedro Alcala for Cadiz who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Pedro Alcala has recovered and rejoins the match in Cadiz.
In the minute 66, Important block from the Cadiz defence as Lionel Messi fires in a strike for Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
At Estadio Ramon de Carranza, Cadiz are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Cadiz.
Throw-in for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Barcelona throw-in in Cadiz's half.
In the minute 71, Barcelona have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Cadiz.
Free kick for Barcelona in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Sergino Dest of Barcelona gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cadiz goal kick.
In the minute 73, Lionel Messi of Barcelona smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Barcelona awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Cadiz at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
In the minute 76, Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Cadiz needs to be cautious. Barcelona have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 77, Ronald Koeman (Barcelona) is making a third substitution, with Trincao replacing Sergino Dest.
The away team have replaced Sergio Busquets with Miralem Pjanic. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ronald Koeman.
Cadiz have a goal kick.
In the minute 79, Cadiz make their third substitution with Augusto Fernandez replacing Jens Jonsson.
Alvaro Cervera is making the team's fourth substitution at Estadio Ramon de Carranza with Bobby Adekanye replacing Alberto Perea.
The home team replace Jairo Izquierdo with Ivan Alejo.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Barcelona at Estadio Ramon de Carranza.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
Corner awarded to Cadiz.
In the minute 84, Barcelona awarded a free kick in their own half.
Barcelona drives forward and Lionel Messi gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
In the minute 86, Barcelona pushes forward through Miralem Pjanic, whose finish on goal is saved.
Cadiz's Bobby Adekanye gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Barcelona a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Jordi Alba (Barcelona) has received a yellow card from Cesar Soto Grado.
Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cadiz defender.
Throw-in for Cadiz in their own half.
In the minute 88, Can Barcelona get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cadiz's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cadiz.
Throw-in for Barcelona in the half of Cadiz.
Barcelona's Antoine Griezmann is on target but unsuccessful.
Barcelona have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Miralem Pjanic (Barcelona) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Cadiz are pushing forward but Alvaro Negredo's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Barcelona goal kick.
Cadiz will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Barcelona.
Important block from the Cadiz defence as Lionel Messi fires in a strike for Barcelona.
Corner awarded to Barcelona.
It's 2-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
